Token.Abstract: The ADMBundle class is a proxy class that treats content directories as NSBundles.
The name of the content bundle
The name of the content bundle
Returns a ADMBundle object initialized to correspond to the specified bundle path.

Parameter.Name: descriptor
Parameter.Abstract: The combined ids of the repository id and bundle id in the form of repo.bundle.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error object returned in case of failure.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSBundle object that corresponds to bundle path, or nil if the bundle does not identify an accessible bundle directory.

Token.Abstract: Returns a ADMBundle object initialized to correspond to the specified bundle path.

Parameter.Name: repositoryId
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the repository that points to the bundle directory's parent directory.

Parameter.Name: bundleId
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the bundle that corresponds to the latest version of the bundle directory.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error object returned in case of failure.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSBundle object that corresponds to bundle path, or nil if the bundle does not identify an accessible bundle directory.

Token.Abstract: Returns a ADMBundle object initialized to correspond to the specified bundle path.

Parameter.Name: descriptor
Parameter.Abstract: The combined ids of the repository id and bundle id in the form of repo.bundle.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error object returned in case of failure.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSBundle object that corresponds to bundle path, or nil if the bundle does not identify an accessible bundle directory.

Token.Abstract: Returns a ADMBundle object initialized to correspond to the specified bundle path.

Parameter.Name: repositoryId
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the repository that points to the bundle directory's parent directory.

Parameter.Name: bundleId
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the bundle that corresponds to the latest version of the bundle directory.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error object returned in case of failure.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSBundle object that corresponds to bundle path, or nil if the bundle does not identify an accessible bundle directory.

Token.Abstract: Returns the NSBundle object that corresponds to the directory where the asset content is located.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSBundle object that corresponds to the directory where the asset content is located, or nil if a bundle object could not be created.
